CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Visit_To__c, 'Distributor'), Distributor_Dealer__r.Area__c, IF(ISPICKVAL(Visit_To__c, 'Dealer'), Distributor_Dealer__r.Area__c, IF(ISPICKVAL(Visit_To__c, 'Contact'), Contacts__r.Area__c, IF(ISPICKVAL(Visit_To__c, 'Project'), Project_Name__r.Area__c ,' '))))
CustomField.label: Area
